casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF David Erickson HUDGENS. No. D-2947. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 21, 2017.

David Erickson Hudgens, of Daphne, Alabama, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
